_schema_desc: Progress/Gauge Chart Template v2.0 - Circular progress indicator
_usage_desc: Best for: Single percentage metrics, completion rates, goals, achievements
_chartType_desc: Identifies this as a progress/gauge chart for the renderer
_value_desc: The value to display (0-100 for percentage, or any number with maxValue)
_maxValue_desc: Maximum value for calculating percentage fill (default 100)
_format_number: Shows value with locale formatting and optional prefix/suffix
_suffix_desc: Text after the number (e.g., K, M, %)

dimensions._desc: Canvas dimensions optimized for TikTok 1:1 format

background._desc: Background color. Use #00FF00 for green screen transparency in CapCut.

title._desc: Main title at the top of the chart

circle._radius_desc: Radius of the progress circle in pixels
circle._backgroundColor_desc: Color of the unfilled portion of the circle
circle._fillColor_desc: Color of the filled progress arc
circle._startAngle_desc: Starting angle in degrees. -90 = top center (12 o'clock)

centerValue._desc: The large percentage/number displayed in the center

label._desc: Optional label below the center value

animation._desc: Controls how the progress arc fills
animation._duration_desc: Animation duration in frames (45 = 1.5 seconds at 30fps)
